Subject: Radar system detects flight
Source Text: The radar system is able to detect a flight based upon the assigned SSR code when the flight crosses a defined FIR/ATC boundary.

Subject: Information available from ACC/Approach Control
Source Text: This information is normally available from the Area Control Centre (ACC) or Approach Control Unit that is associated with an airport.

Subject: ELDT is updated
Source Text: Effect Update of the ELDT can trigger a new TOBT to be entered by the AO/GH, or calculated automatically by the Airport CDM Platform.

Subject: AO/GH enters new TOBT
Source Text: Update of the ELDT can trigger a new TOBT to be entered by the AO/GH

Subject: Airport CDM Platform calculates new TOBT
Source Text: or calculated automatically by the Airport CDM Platform.

Subject: EIBT computation
Source Text: An estimated in-block time (EIBT) is computed using the ELDT and the estimated taxi-in time.

Subject: Turn-round and passenger decisions made
Source Text: Decisions such as the turn-round period, connecting passengers etc are taken and need to be stable at this event.

Subject: TOBT update for departing flight
Source Text: The update of TOBT for the related departing flight takes place following this milestone.

Subject: TOBT process commenced
Source Text: Procedures To commence the TOBT process and check whether the AO/GH TOBT is consistent with the ATC Flight Plan.

Subject: AO/GH TOBT consistency check with ATC Flight Plan
Source Text: Procedures To commence the TOBT process and check whether the AO/GH TOBT is consistent with the ATC Flight Plan.

Subject: Network Operations informed of TTOT changes
Source Text: Network Operations is informed when the TTOT changes by more than the agreed TTOT tolerance.

Subject: Flight enters FIR/local airspace
Source Text: Definition The flight enters the FIR (Flight Information Region) or the local airspace of the destination airport.

Source Text: The radar system is able to detect a flight based upon the assigned SSR code when the flight crosses a defined FIR/ATC boundary.

Subject: Flight detected by radar
Source Text: This process is triggered by n the detection of the flight by radar in either FIR, TMA, or on Final Approach.

Subject: Operational status changes to FIR
Source Text: Operational Status (changes to) FIR

Subject: ELDT, EIBT, TOBT and TTOT updated in ACISP
Source Text: Action on CDM Operation (ACISP) ELDT, EIBT, TOBT and TTOT updated

Subject: Verify ATC Flight Plan feasibility
Source Text: This check shall be performed to verify feasibility of the ATC Flight Plan given the updated TOBT.

Subject: TTOT tolerance checked
Source Text: The TTOT tolerance is respected before Network Operations is informed of updated TTOT.

Source Text: The TTOT tolerance is respected before Network Operations is informed of updated TTOT.
